Agi.effect: Deals light damage in a small area. Inflicts Burn.

Agidyne.effect: Deals heavy damage in a small area. Inflicts Burn.

Agilao.effect: Deals medium damage in a small area. Inflicts Burn.

Ailment Shield.effect: Automatically cures ailment on adjacent ally. Activates 1 time.

Ailment Shield+.effect: Automatically cures ailment on adjacent ally. Activates 2 times.

Ambush.effect: Shoots targets that enter area and stops action of any non-unique enemies. Activates 1 time.

Ambush+.effect: Shoots targets that enter area and stops action of any non-unique enemies. Activates 2 times.

Angelic Instincts.effect: User recovers 30% HP when target is defeated.
